title: The Ice Box Murders /// Part 1 /// 443
description:
The Ice Box Murders /// Part 1 /// 443

Part 1 of 2

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

June 1965 - Houston, Texas. Over the course of Father’s Day weekend someone murdered Fred and Edwina Rogers in their home. The killer dismembered the victims and stuffed them in the refrigerator. Who killed the elderly couple? What was the motive or motives for the murders? Join us in the Garage as we go back in time and review this cold case.

Beer of the Week - Tramps Like Us by Intersect Brewing Garage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps out of 5

The full archive of True Crime Garage is available on the Stitcher listening app - for FREE. Our show “Off the Record” is only on Stitcher Premium. For a FREE month of listening go to http://stitcherpremium.com/truecrimegarage and use promo code GARAGE

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
